ModMetaData.name: Cheap Plastic and Plasteel
ModMetaData.author: Sixdd
ModMetaData.description:
This is an altered version of the original mod 'Make Plastic and Plasteel'.
It is now possible to create Plasteel by combining Plastic and Steel at an Electric Smelter.
Items added: Starch Plastic (Can be purchased and used as construction material)
Task Added in Electric Smelter: Make Starch -> 5 Corn = 1 Starch Make Plastic -> 1 Starch = 1 Plastic Make Plasteel -> 1 Plastic + 1 Steel = 1 Plasteel
